This will remove material and create the final shape of a cylindrical object with a slightly tapered top and bottom. The rim surrounding the central hole will remain in place.</description>

This operation results in the creation of a new solid body. Note: The height, width, and length of each intermediate part may differ from the final shape's dimensions due to scaling or transformations.
